title: Fiend's List wiped
body: I logged into League of Legends yesterday and noticed that my friend's list was wiped.  I saw some threads about restarting the client/restarting my pc, but still my list of friends are still gone.  Does anyone else have this issue or know how to get it fixed?

replies.body: Hey I looked into this and don't see any friends on your list. :(  I hate to say it but it looks like there has been some pretty suspicions activity on your account.  I highly recommend you change your password and run through our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to keep your info safe in and outside of League.  Let me know if you have any questions!

That is crazy.. lol, I have not even payed in a few months... I don't know how suspicious activity is being done.  Can you let me know what kind of suspicious activity you may be talking about? I seriously just logged into my account a few days ago... Also, is there any way to restore my friends list from the last time i actually played a game.  I want to say it was 02/24/2017
